about_the_game:
"

Portal Packs - Token Essentials: Fiends & Outsiders 2



Art by:  Allen Michael N. Geneta  




Layout by: Anna Michelle  Meservier  


Enter the Portal and journey to the Lower Planes!
Fiends & Outsiders 2 is another entry in our ongoing & popular series of PC, NPC and Monster tokens.
Build your demonic army with 24 beautifully drawn tokens. Whether you need imagery for Imps, Rakshasa or even a Pit Fiend, we've got you covered. Additionally, each token has twelve color variants so you can find just the right style for your campaign.
As always our tokens are fully compatible with any of our One Minute Maps series.
Enjoy! "
